welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rietberg, Germany! This charming city is known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and soak in the beauty of Rietberg during your visit. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paderborn/lippstadt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paderborn/lippstadt Airport, used primarily for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. A password is required, which can be obtained at the information desk.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
